overview: Recorded live at the Malvinas Argentinas Covered Stadium, on May 12, 2012. The emblematic Argentine heavy metal band Malón, emerged from the ashes of Hermética -another emblem of Argentine heavy metal-, became one of the most important of the scene from the 90s until their separation in 1998. After the return at the end of 2011, where they demonstrated their validity, they edit this shocking document that has never been seen in the Argentine heavy music industry, unique and historical in the history of heavy metal of all Latin America.
title: Malón 360º
